full_summary:
=================
**Tender Notice: Compact Excavator**

**Reference Number:** WS3578529610
**Publication Date:** January 13, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** February 6, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST

**Government of Canada Tender Information**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None specified
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia

**Tender Details**

* The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking a supplier to provide one (1) new compact excavator for the field program and general maintenance requirements of the diagnostics and research programs at the Sidney Laboratory, North Saanich, BC.
* The procurement will be made through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process.

**Selected Criteria**

* The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

**Submission Requirements**

* Bids must be submitted by February 6, 2023, at 2:00 pm EST.
* Bids must be submitted electronically through the Merx online tendering system.
* Bidders must ensure their bids meet all requirements outlined in the tender document.

**Contact Information**

* Contact: Bryan Kelly, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Email: [kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**URL:**

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15127421?extsite=MTUxMjc0MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
--------------[END]
